name: Swapp
tagline: Heroku button template for a simple web app
body: ### Welcome to GitHub Pages. Swapp is a simple web application that can be used as a starting point to create your own Heroku app. This deployment package uses standard enterprise technologies like Java, Spring, Hibernate and connect these with a state of the art cloud based managed platform. This architectural pattern can be used to demonstrate the strenght of Heroku working toegether with established enterprise technologies. You can deploy your own version of Swapp on Heroku in seconds using the given Heroku button:
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
